name: Miami Drift
description:
Miami Drift is a racing game with synthwave graphics and 16-Bit Music!

Control a 70s sports car and race against your greatest rival, Billy the Speedy. The fastest shall claim the Speed Devil's Crown!

Select the difficulty (I suggest starting with normal or easy to get the hang on the game).

Don't spam click the "GAS" button, it'll make you go fast enough to beat the game.

Instead, click only while the button is on fire, as it'll give you a big speed boost.

The button gets on fire around once every second, so don't rush it!

Background image in this post by rawpixel.com on Freepik.
